G:\pset4\save\327687561.dump -i -p -a -b G:\pset4\save\o_327687561.spv

VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-pCode-08740(ERROR / SPEC): msgNum: 115483881 - Validation Error: [ VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-pCode-08740 ] | MessageID = 0x6e224e9 | vkCreateShaderModule(): The SPIR-V Capability (StorageImageWriteWithoutFormat) was declared, but one of the following requirements is required (VkPhysicalDeviceFeatures::shaderStorageImageWriteWithoutFormat OR VK_VERSION_1_3 OR VK_KHR_format_feature_flags2). The Vulkan spec states: If pCode is a pointer to SPIR-V code, and pCode declares any of the capabilities listed in the SPIR-V Environment appendix, one of the corresponding requirements must be satisfied (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.3.261.1/windows/1.3-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-pCode-08740)
    Objects: 0
VUID-vkCmdDrawIndexed-viewType-07752(ERROR / SPEC): msgNum: -836363996 - Validation Error: [ VUID-vkCmdDrawIndexed-viewType-07752 ] Object 0: handle = 0x7f79ad0000000050, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_DESCRIPTOR_SET; Object 1: handle = 0xa21a4e0000000030, type = VK_OBJECT_TYPE_IMAGE_VIEW; | MessageID = 0xce261924 | vkCmdDrawIndexed: Descriptor set VkDescriptorSet 0x7f79ad0000000050[] in binding #0 index 0 ImageView type is VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_2D but the OpTypeImage has (Dim = 1D) and (Arrrayed = 0). The Vulkan spec states: If a VkImageView is accessed as a result of this command, then the image view's viewType must match the Dim operand of the OpTypeImage as described in Instruction/Sampler/Image View Validation (https://vulkan.lunarg.com/doc/view/1.3.261.1/windows/1.3-extensions/vkspec.html#VUID-vkCmdDrawIndexed-viewType-07752)
    Objects: 2
       [0]  0x7f79ad0000000050, type: 23, name: NULL
       [1]  0xa21a4e0000000030, type: 14, name: NULL
